about_the_game:
You, Ripley, have been worked to the bone in an effort to stay on the straight and narrow. Cooking, plating, rinsing, repeating. On your one day off, you decide to take your partner Iris and their camera to a planning party for your friend Erik’s future thesis film. But the footage Erik wants to capture is more than you or Iris bargained for.

Will you be able to protect your partner from what lies before you?

This Party is Killer is a horror visual novel inspired by classic American slasher films. Playing as Ripley, you make choices throughout the night of the party to determine both Iris's fate and your own. You can also search your surroundings "point-and-click" style for key insights into the world you are exploring.

  • A visual novel with choices throughout to determine your ending

  • Choose how you take care of Iris; decide your combined fates

  • Watch the wheel of cyclical violence spin in a short but sweet format

  • Over 120+ lovingly painted pieces of key art

  • LGBT+ cast of characters

  • Splattershot gore and uncomfortable encounters that will leave you squirming

content_descriptors.notes: TPIK contains scenes of graphic torture, killing, and unwanted advances. There is also mentions of harming a fictional character who is a minor. While there is a toggle setting to censor the gore in the options menu, player discretion is still advised.

  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
